title: SCP Pride Template
content:
[[module CSS]]
@import url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--code/component:scp-pride/1)
[[/module]]

[[iftags +component]]
This component replaces the default version of the SCP Logo with a Pride version.

Use it with the following:

> @@[[include component:scp-pride]]@@

[[code type="css"]]
#header {
    background-image: url('https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/component:scp-pride/scp_pride_icon2.svg')
}
[[/code]]
[[/iftags]]
author: The Great Hippo
